question: I am 42 years old and when I graduated high school I weighed 98lbs.Now I weigh 157. I've tried to exercise but I get tired almost before I start. I can't afford any fo the Weight watchers or Slim Fast or anything.I never had to diet before,and I don't eat any more than I used too. I do have Type 1 diabetes,and hypothyroidism.What can I do to speed up my matabolism and loose the weight.
title: How to get rid of unwanted weight?
